attributes.action: allow young apprentices below the age of 18 to be recognised as workers, so giving them the right to have the same minimum wage as other apprentices. this will reduce the near slave treatment of young people, 40 hours per week for £80 is tantamount to slave labour already and this government should uphold the right of all empolyee's to have the national minimum wage regardless of age.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: £80 per week for a minimum of 40 hours is unfair in any country, we were amazed that britain is willing to allow companies to employ young people under the age of 18 for such a low amount and should be addressed/stopped immediately.
